appDescription.message: Copy, paste and translate text from any image, video or PDF.

ocrDimensionError.message: The parameter is incorrect.Image size is not supported. Each image dimension must be between 40 and 2600 pixels.

userMediaUnsupported.message: Your browser does not support desktop capture
